snippet: After market close on Thursday, G.M. will replace H. J. Heinz in Standard & Poor’s famous 100- and 500-stock indexes, amid the auto maker’s continued efforts to repay the federal government for its taxpayer-financed bailout.
abstract: After market close on Thursday, G.M. will replace H. J. Heinz in Standard & Poor’s famous 100- and 500-stock indexes, amid the auto maker’s continued efforts to repay the federal government for its taxpayer-financed bailout.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: G.M. to Replace Heinz in the S.&P. 500
